response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value and quality, I'm confident it's worth more than what others are willing to pay. I'm extending this opportunity to you at an exclusive price of $150, considering your interest and the product's alignment with your needs. This offer is tailored to ensure you receive the best value while also allowing me to maximize the return on my investment. I look forward to your consideration.", "product_price": 150}
